name: 健康促進與衛生教育英文文獻選讀及寫作
goals: In-depth understanding, reading, discussion, and  thesis writing skills of relevant research in the field of  health education.
This course will instruct students to collect, read,  summarize and put forward discussions, also guide  thesis writing methods and presentation skills
